title: Mana Regen changes are not fun for ARAM
body:
Always out of mana in ARAM now, especially since Chalice was nerfed hard.

Please increase mana regen in general on items, it sucks sitting there not being able to do anything for parts of the game.

replies.body: get tear challice and morellonomicon, mana? what mana?
yeah the mana regen items are getting quite lack luster and undesirable
Just build a combination of mana regen items then you will never run out :P

Build ton of damag- wait, wrong one.

Build tons of mana then.
